typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species_Desc as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup(Species_Code == Species_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Species Code cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(Species_Code)) || not(isNull(Species_Desc)) || not(isNull(Genus)) || not(isNull(Species_Group))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp) || notEquals(Species_Desc, Species_Lkp) || notEquals(Genus, Genus_Lkp) || notEquals(Species_Group, Species_Group_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy(Species_Code,
		Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(Species_Desc = iifNull(Species_Desc, "Undefined"),
		Genus = iifNull(Genus, "Undefined"),
		Species_Group = iifNull(Species_Group, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Species_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Species = Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Species = Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
